mapper.select: SELECT scraping_id, ecard_id, request_data, callback_data, response_message, status, created_at, updated_at FROM scraping WHERE scraping_id = #{scrapingId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO scraping ( scraping_id, ecard_id, scraping_type, request_data, status, created_at ) VALUES ( #{scrapingId}, #{ecardId}, #{scrapingType}, #{requestData}, #{status}, now() )
mapper.update: UPDATE scraping SET callback_data = #{callbackData}, response_message = #{responseMessage}, status = #{status}, updated_at = now() WHERE scraping_id = #{scrapingId};
